channel.title: Pocket C.H.I.P on
channel.description: Recent content in Pocket C.H.I.P on

item.title: Package manager and SSH
item.description: Setting up package manager The Next Thing Co.’s package repository is dead for a long time, but one guy still mirrors them.

item.title: Installing Web Browser
item.description: By default, Pocket C.H.I.P. is packed with firefox-esr, but right after starting it (which itself took, like, 30sec) the first tab crashed immediately, so probably it’s not the way to go.
